name: Vertex
title: Google
Cloud
Vision
Annotation
Vertex
description:
Vertex

A vertex in a set of bounding polygon vertices.

See Face::Bounds and Text.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud"

gcloud = Google::Cloud.new
vision = gcloud.vision

image = vision.image "path/to/text.png"
text = image.text

text.bounds.count #=> 4
vertex = text.bounds.first
vertex.x #=> 13
vertex.y #=> 8
